content.rendered:
Directed by Corrie Chen.

Written by Pip Karmel. Rebecca Starford. Magda Wozniak.

Cast Jana McKinnon (Jo Mackenzie). Yerin Ha (Alice). Erana James (Ronnie). Mantshologane Maile (Ruby). Melissa Kahraman (Briohny). Dan Spielman (Keith Mackenzie). Tuuli Narkle (Miss Lacey). Diana Glenn (Caroline Mackenzie). Abbey Morgan (Emma). Daya Czepanski (Saskia). Bronte Locke. Jessica Lu (Simone). Malaynee Hayden. Syd Zygier (Gabby). Tina Cao (Cute Patron). Nicholas Coghlan (Mr. Pegg). Sally McLean (Miss Constantine). Sunny S. Walia (Mr. Bishop). Nic Layton (Diner). Alexander Artemov (Archie). Jessica Lu. Alex Donnelley (Lucas). John Byrne (Father Wilson). Sue Hill (Rich parent). Cassidy Dunn (Freya). Hoang Pham (Pianist)

Language English.

Producers Amanda Duthie. Debbie Lee. Alastair McKinnon. Cailah Scobie. Amanda Wray. Amanda Higgs.

Production Film Victoria. Matchbox Pictures. NBCUniversal.

No. of Episodes 4

Status On Going (2023–)
